title: Supreme Court finds a compromise in reviving Trump's travel ban
text: Without hearing arguments in the two cases, the justices agreed the lower courts had gone too far. The outcome suggests that many of the justices were as troubled by the bold intervention of the judges who blocked Trump's order as they were by the bold action of the new president.
summary:
Without hearing arguments in the two cases, the justices agreed the lower courts had gone too far.
The outcome suggests that many of the justices were as troubled by the bold intervention of the judges who blocked Trump's order as they were by the bold action of the new president.
